I was wondering if anyone is aware of a good howto for properly integrating JUnit into 
Apple's XCode? I can manually run tests, but I've had no luck modifying the generated Ant 
build files to cleanly incorporate JUnit testing into my workflow. I'd appreciate any pointers 
anyone can recommend!
